name: hieroglyph
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a picture or symbol that represents a word, used in some writing systems, such as the one used in ancient Egypt: The inscriptions that lined the walls of ancient Egyptian tombs were written in hieroglyphs. It was not until the 1970s that the full meaning of many Mayan hieroglyphs was understood. Related words
hieroglyphic
hieroglyphically
